title: Move It!
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: One thing most kids have in common is how much they love toys! Move It! describes how different toys move. Detailed photographs and repetitive text support early emergent readers. In addition to working on decoding skills, students will have the opportunity to identify the author's purpose as well as to connect to prior knowledge to better understand the text.
meta: bounces, dumps, falls, flies, floats, rolls, spins, sprays, toy
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Author's Purpose : Identify the author’s purpose for writing a text
Initial Sound : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Mm
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word this

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
